name: Volactose® Whey Permeate
description: Volactose® Whey Permeate is a premium quality, finely textured de-proteinised whey powder, suitable for a wide variety of applications. It contains 86% lactose and is an ideal substitute for whey powders in products where salt reduction, texture and visual appeal are the foremost requirements. Having a naturally salty flavor enables Volactose® Whey Permeate to be used to reduce or eliminate salt from food formulations, thereby minimizing the sodium content of the finished product.
